mapper.select: SELECT dt , dt + INTERVAL (1 - DAYOFWEEK(dt)) DAY sdt , dt + INTERVAL (7 - DAYOFWEEK(dt)) DAY edt , dt + INTERVAL (1 - DAYOFWEEK(dt) + 7) DAY nextSdt , dt + INTERVAL (7 - DAYOFWEEK(dt) + 7) DAY nextEdt , DATE_FORMAT(ym, '%Y-%m') ym , FLOOR(DATEDIFF(dt , ym + INTERVAL (1 - DAYOFWEEK(ym) + CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(ym) > 4 THEN 7 ELSE 0 END) DAY ) / 7 + 1) weekOf FROM (SELECT DISTINCT DATE(#{today}) dt , DATE_FORMAT(#{today} + INTERVAL (4 -DAYOFWEEK(#{today})) DAY, '%Y-%m-01') ym ) a ;
